languages.text: {n}Проктор подается вперед, вглядываясь в лица обвинителей.{/n} "Вы собрались тут, чтобы ложью и уловками задавить единственн{mf|ого|ую}, кто может обуздать Простор Коронус. Наплевав на {mf|его|ее} заслуги, на власть священного Патента и на Лекс Империалис, вы расписались в собственной ереси".

{n}Solomorne steps forward, looking into the faces of the accusers.{/n} "You have gathered here to crush with lies and trickery the only person capable of taming the Koronus Expanse. By scorning {mf|his|her} achievements, the power of the sacred Warrant, and the Lex Imperialis, you have signed your names to heresy."
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор подается вперед, вглядываясь в лица обвинителей.{/n} "Вы собрались тут, чтобы ложью и уловками задавить единственн{mf|ого|ую}, кто может обуздать Простор Коронус. Наплевав на {mf|его|ее} заслуги, на власть священного Патента и на Лекс Империалис, вы расписались в собственной ереси".

By scorning {mf|his|her} achievements, the power of the sacred Warrant, and the Lex Imperialis, you have signed your names to heresy."

{n}Solomorne steps forward, looking into the faces of the accusers.{/n} "You have gathered here to crush with lies and trickery the only person capable of taming the Koronus Expanse. By scorning {mf|his|her} achievements, the power of the sacred Warrant, and the Lex Imperialis, you have signed your names to heresy."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne tritt vor und sieht den Anklägern ins Gesicht.{/n} "Ihr habt Euch hier versammelt, um mit Lügen und Hinterlist die einzige Person zu vernichten, die in der Lage ist, die Koronus-Ausdehnung zu bändigen. Als Ihr {mf|seine|ihre} Erfolge, die Macht des heiligen Handelsbriefs und das Lex Imperia geschmäht habt, habt Ihr Euch der Ketzerei schuldig gemacht."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne steps forward, looking into the faces of the accusers.{/n} "You have gathered here to crush with lies and trickery the only person capable of taming the Koronus Expanse. By scorning {mf|his|her} achievements, the power of the sacred Warrant, and the Lex Imperialis, you have signed your names to heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne tritt vor und sieht den Anklägern ins Gesicht.{/n} "Ihr habt Euch hier versammelt, um mit Lügen und Hinterlist die einzige Person zu vernichten, die in der Lage ist, die Koronus-Ausdehnung zu bändigen. Als Ihr {mf|seine|ihre} Erfolge, die Macht des heiligen Handelsbriefs und das Lex Imperia geschmäht habt, habt Ihr Euch der Ketzerei schuldig gemacht."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne s'avance en dévisageant les accusateurs.{/n} « Vous êtes rassemblés ici pour écraser sous les mensonges et les faussetés la seule personne capable de dompter les Étendues de Koronus. En dénigrant ses succès, le pouvoir de la lettre de marque sacrée et la Lex Imperialis, vous vous rendez coupables d'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne steps forward, looking into the faces of the accusers.{/n} "You have gathered here to crush with lies and trickery the only person capable of taming the Koronus Expanse. By scorning {mf|his|her} achievements, the power of the sacred Warrant, and the Lex Imperialis, you have signed your names to heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne s'avance en dévisageant les accusateurs.{/n} « Vous êtes rassemblés ici pour écraser sous les mensonges et les faussetés la seule personne capable de dompter les Étendues de Koronus. En dénigrant ses succès, le pouvoir de la lettre de marque sacrée et la Lex Imperialis, vous vous rendez coupables d'hérésie. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙向前走了一步，盯着所有指控你的人。{/n}“你们聚集在这里，就是打算用谎言与诡计消灭唯一有能力驾驭科罗努斯扩区的人。你们蔑视{mf|他|她}的成就，蔑视神圣授状赋予的权力，蔑视帝国法典，你们已经沦为了异端恶行的帮凶。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne steps forward, looking into the faces of the accusers.{/n} "You have gathered here to crush with lies and trickery the only person capable of taming the Koronus Expanse. By scorning {mf|his|her} achievements, the power of the sacred Warrant, and the Lex Imperialis, you have signed your names to heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙向前走了一步，盯着所有指控你的人。{/n}“你们聚集在这里，就是打算用谎言与诡计消灭唯一有能力驾驭科罗努斯扩区的人。你们蔑视{mf|他|她}的成就，蔑视神圣授状赋予的权力，蔑视帝国法典，你们已经沦为了异端恶行的帮凶。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne da un paso adelante y mira a la acusación a la cara.{/n} «Se han reunido aquí para destruir con mentiras y engaños a la única persona capaz de domar la Extensión de Koronus. Al desdeñar sus logros, el poder de la sagrada Patente y la Lex Imperialis, se han condenado a la herejía».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne steps forward, looking into the faces of the accusers.{/n} "You have gathered here to crush with lies and trickery the only person capable of taming the Koronus Expanse. By scorning {mf|his|her} achievements, the power of the sacred Warrant, and the Lex Imperialis, you have signed your names to heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne da un paso adelante y mira a la acusación a la cara.{/n} «Se han reunido aquí para destruir con mentiras y engaños a la única persona capaz de domar la Extensión de Koronus. Al desdeñar sus logros, el poder de la sagrada Patente y la Lex Imperialis, se han condenado a la herejía».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは一歩前に出て、告発者たちの顔を見つめる。{/n}「お前たちはここに集い、コロヌス・エクスパンスを制御できる唯一の人物を虚偽と策謀で潰そうとしている。この方の功績を嘲り、聖なる令状の力とレックス・インペリアを貶めることで、お前たちは自ら異端の名に署名したのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne steps forward, looking into the faces of the accusers.{/n} "You have gathered here to crush with lies and trickery the only person capable of taming the Koronus Expanse. By scorning {mf|his|her} achievements, the power of the sacred Warrant, and the Lex Imperialis, you have signed your names to heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは一歩前に出て、告発者たちの顔を見つめる。{/n}「お前たちはここに集い、コロヌス・エクスパンスを制御できる唯一の人物を虚偽と策謀で潰そうとしている。この方の功績を嘲り、聖なる令状の力とレックス・インペリアを貶めることで、お前たちは自ら異端の名に署名したのだ」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, davacıların yüzlerine bakarak bir adım ileri çıkıyor.{/n} "Koronus Enginliği'ni ehlîleştirme yetisine sahip tek kişiyi yalanlarınızla, düzenbazlıkla bitirmek için el birliği etmişsiniz. Hür Tacir'in başardıklarını, kutsal Ruhsatname ve Lex İmperialis'in kelamını ayağa düşürerek adınızı kâfirler arasına yazdırdınız."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne steps forward, looking into the faces of the accusers.{/n} "You have gathered here to crush with lies and trickery the only person capable of taming the Koronus Expanse. By scorning {mf|his|her} achievements, the power of the sacred Warrant, and the Lex Imperialis, you have signed your names to heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, davacıların yüzlerine bakarak bir adım ileri çıkıyor.{/n} "Koronus Enginliği'ni ehlileştirme yetisine sahip tek kişiyi yalanlarınızla, düzenbazlıkla bitirmek için el birliği etmişsiniz. Hür Tacir'in başardıklarını, kutsal Ruhsatname ve Lex İmperialis'in kelâmını ayağa düşürerek adınızı kâfirler arasına yazdırdınız."
